    • Field Detail

      • DELAYTIME

        private final int DELAYTIME
        This sets the playtime of the tone in ms. It also affects the framerate. The framerate is 1000/DELAYTIME. Default: 2000
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HILBERTORDER

        private final int HILBERTORDER
        This sets the order of the hilbert curve that is used to sort the pixels of an image. The main impact for the user is the number of oscillators that depends heavily on the hilbert order. The higher the order of the hilbert curve, the higher is the resolution of the representation/more oscillators Choose a value of 1 (4 Oscs), 2 (16) or 3 (64). The maximum resolution is 64 oscs (a higher order just adds multiple oscs with the same frequencys). This maximum is set because the calculation costs is rising exponentially and 64 was a tradeoff between an "high" resolution and small calculation costs. Default: 1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Starting point of the program. It sets the fonts and initializes the buttons. Additionally the used objects are initialized and the resolution of the auditive representation is calculated.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Displays the image according to the statemachine that is implemented inside. It is connected to the buttons.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Function to stop the oscillators from playing after a set period of time

      • run

        private void run()
        Sorting the pictures according to the hilbert curve and calculating the auditive representation.
